com.github.dandelion.core

Interface Component

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreComponent

    public interface Component

    Interface for all Dandelion components.

    A component must define:

    • a logical name that is mainly used for logging purpose. It is also used to indicate whether the component must be used in standalone mode thanks to the DandelionConfig.COMPONENTS_STANDALONE configuration option
    • a bundle loader, implementing the BundleLoader interface, that will tell Dandelion where to scan for bundles in the classpath
    • (optional) a debug menu, implementing the DebugMenu interface, that will be automatically displayed in the Dandelion debugger
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau
